Recommendations: to prioritize the training program to be undertaken in each target clientelebarangay training need assessment should be first conduct
after the evaluation make during each extension activity conduct this should be analyze for possible replanning
all extension activity should be properly document
faculty member in the college conduct extension service should be deloaded or give equivalent teach load to encourage them to do more extension service for the benefit of target clientele
the extension office should be equip with the need equipment such as a set of computer with printer for the documentation and filing of need information
a regular office clerk should be hire to help man the extension office to perform clerical job and assist in the implementation of extension activity
